1: ה֣וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>Woe</n> רֹעִ֗ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>be unto the pastors</n> מְאַבְּדִ֧ים <sup>6 </sup> <n>that destroy</n> וּמְפִצִ֛ים <sup>6327 </sup> <n>and scatter</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹ֥אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>the sheep</n> מַרְעִיתִ֖י <sup>4830 </sup> <n>of my pasture</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
2: לָ֠כֵן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֨ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הָרֹעִים֮ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>against the pastors</n> הָרֹעִ֣ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>that feed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּי֒ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> אַתֶּ֞ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> הֲפִצֹתֶ֤ם <sup>6327 </sup> <n>Ye have scattered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹאנִי֙ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>my flock</n> וַתַּדִּח֔וּם <sup>5080 </sup> <n>and driven them away</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> פְקַדְתֶּ֖ם <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and have not visited</n> אֹתָ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>I am about</n> פֹקֵ֧ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>them behold I will visit</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֹ֥עַ <sup>7455 </sup> <n>upon you the evil</n> מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>4611 </sup> <n>of your doings</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
3: וַאֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>Myself</n> אֲקַבֵּץ֙ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>And I will gather</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>the remnant</n> צֹאנִ֔י <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of my flock</n> מִכֹּל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of all countries</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>I</n> הִדַּ֥חְתִּי <sup>5080 </sup> <n>whither I have driven</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> שָׁ֑ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>them</n> וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <sup>7725 </sup> <n>them and will bring them again</n> אֶתְהֶ֛ן <sup>853 </sup> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> נְוֵהֶ֖ן <sup>5116 </sup> <n>to their folds</n> וּפָר֥וּ <sup>6509 </sup> <n>and they shall be fruitful</n> וְרָבֽוּ׃ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and increase</n>
4: וַהֲקִמֹתִ֧י <sup>6965 </sup> <n>And I will set up</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רֹעִ֖ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>shepherds</n> וְרָע֑וּם <sup>7462 </sup> <n>over them which shall feed</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִֽירְא֨וּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>them and they shall fear</n> ע֧וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>any</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יֵחַ֛תּוּ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>no more nor be dismayed</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִפָּקֵ֖דוּ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>neither shall they be lacking</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
